## bloom doc

Generates documentation

### Synopsis

The doc command generates documentation for the CLI application.

```
bloom doc <output_directory> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --format string   Documentation format (markdown, md, man) (default "markdown")
  -h, --help            help for doc
```
